Description:
1x IN - Failure to take appropriate steps to reduce the risk to those employees arising from the task of stacking the finished boxes on pallets to the lowest level reasonably practicable in that they start the stack essentially at ground level which caused them to have to repeatedly crouch down in order to load the pallet.

1x IN - You have no safe working loads or acceptable load distributions displayed for your racking and there was bowing of the shelving indicating they may be overloaded.

1x IN - Failure to take appropriate steps to reduce the risk to those employees arising from manual handling tasks in that none of your templates stored on racking had their weight indicated.
